TopicTitle: Need help installing sci-fi visual enhancements

Articles.Content: The title says it all. I’m getting bored of the stock scenery, and want to jazz up my KSP experience. Don’t tell me to use CKAN, that’s not helpful. I am using Mac OSX. Thank you in advance.

I don't think SciFiVE is on CKAN anyway. But to install it manually, install EVE first, then replace the EVE configs with the SciFi ones. The last time I installed that mod was several months ago, so I don't really remember properly.

For mod-specific enquiries such as this you really can't go wrong with asking in the mod's own thread, because that's where all the people who'd actually know the answers are most likely to see the question.
